extendedInfo.description: Do you want to know the energy consumption of your devices in your home? Forgot to switch off your coffee machine? Or do you want to remotely turn on your lights before you arrive at home?With Dfifthplay Energy Smart for iOS, you get insights and are in control!V1.1 features:-	Added (central) meter supportV1.0 features:-	Turn Smart Plugs On / Off-	Check the status of your devices-	Monitor the Energy consumption of your devices-	View kWh, â¬, CO2 per day, week, month or year-	View historical energy consumption graphs up to 15 minute time intervalsfifthplay Energy Smart for iOS can only be used in combination with a fifthplay Energy Smart energy management system with smart plugs or with a connection to a smart meter. For more information, visit www.fifthplay.com
